    Website Chairs

    Zhaochun Ren, Fajie Yuan

    EMNLP 2022 Blog

    EMNLP 2022 will take place from the 7th to the 11th of December 2022, hopefully in Abu Dhabi, but possibly online depending on the development of the covid situation.

    Following previous conferences, the EMNLP 2022 website will now include a blog with posts from various conference chairs. New blog posts will be announced on the website and on social media.

    Tags: announcement, publicity

    Categories: blog

    Updated: February 21, 2022
